full_summary:
### Request for Proposal: Warehouse, Distribution and Shipping Services

Revised Description: 
Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking to acquire warehouse, distribution, and shipping services in support of its IT lifecycle management requirements. A prime contractor is required to provide warehousing, distribution, and shipping services for SSC's IT equipment across Canada. The services will be provided from facilities located within the National Capital Region (NCR), Barrie/Borden, ON, and Dorval, QC.

### Important Dates

- Publication Date: September 16, 2022
- Closing Date: November 30, 2022 2:00 PM (EST)
- Last Date to Ask Question: November 22, 2022

### Background
SSC annually procures a large quantity of IT equipment that requires pre-deployment storage, transportation, and delivery. The prime contractor will be expected to store and distribute approximately [insert quantity] units annually.

### Trade Agreements involved

- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- 
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

### Regions of Opportunity
- Canada
- Provide services from facilities located in the National Capital Region (NCR), Barrie/Borden, ON, and Dorval, QC.

### Notice for ITCs
Share this notice with niche bidders who specialize in warehouse, distribution, and shipping services for IT equipment. You can share the notice with the ITC for them to reach out [contactPIKULA, Krys.+1 613 668 2207 +1 613 668 4490 or via email [krys.pikula@ssc-spc.gc.ca][1] about any inquiries you might have.

### bidder Meeting and Tour Schedule
Bidder Meetings and Tour of sites will be scheduled.
